name: Chivalric Saga
description:
A knight who rolls. He will die if he stops.
Use the mushrooms to help.

How to play.

The mushrooms will appear where you click on the screen. 
mouse down: put mushrooms 
A key: rotate mushrooms 
D key: rotate mushrooms  
R key: reset level

Made for Ludum Dare 46

The theme is "Keep it alive."

https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/46
